description: This file defines a UI component named TitleGrid using the LightningJS framework. It renders a grid of items, each displaying a title and category, and handles selection events.

classes.name: TitleGrid
classes.description: A component that displays a grid of items with titles and categories, allowing selection of individual items.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Emits a 'select' event with the selected item when an item is clicked.
